sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> Dear TWC API Customer, We are currently experiencing an issue with SUN API - Location, Alerts, and Notifications. Our Support Engineering Teams are working to rectify the issue as soon as possible and will continue to monitor our systems after we are back to normal operating status. In the interim, you may see sporadic API availability or performance issues. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. We will send another notification once our teams are able to provide an update to this issue. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us at premiumsupport@weather.com or at 855-221-2862. Thanks, Global Technical Operations Center
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: comm_external_support_description
